45909.affected_area: Edmonton (Laurel & South of Anthoney Henday South Highway)
live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Technicians are on standby to restore services once power has been restored.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45909.summary: Some customers in Edmonton (Laurel & South of Anthoney Henday South Highway) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
